channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Dunedin Half Marathon 2024
item.description: I woke up at 6:45am not wanting to get out of bed in the slightest. It felt so cold. I got up and made a coffee then brought it back to bed with me to watch some YouTube. I was not enthusiastic but I knew this race was going to happen no matter how I felt. I knew leading up to it, I’m not going to get as good a time as last year.

item.title: My Second Post
item.description: This is my second post I am using Hugo and git on multiple computers to test out pushing changes to the website from both my laptop and my desktop. :)

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Here I am testing out making some changes on the new site This is a heading And a sub heading def function() { print("this is a function") }
